content: The best time to visit India for exploring Buddhist art and architecture would be between October to March, which is the winter season when the weather is mild and pleasant. This is also the peak tourist season, so you should expect high traffic in most of these sites. However, it's good to note that the winter season is preferable as the climate is comfortable for exploration. Keep in mind, though, that some of these places are at a higher altitude, so the temperatures can drop low, and you're advised to bring warm clothing, especially during the night. In contrast, the summer months, from May to August, can be extremely hot and humid, making it unpleasant to explore these sites. Overall, the ideal time to visit India would be during the winter months, for the perfect weather conditions to explore the sites comfortably.
